name: Boss Hunter (Erkfor Games)
description:
This is a 2D platformer game. 
You play as a boss hunter who tries to defeat all the bosses to get their powers.
This game is difficult, every boss you defeat the next one is harder, you need to unlock new powers, learn game techniques to collect skulls (game currency) and become unbeatable.

this is the pc version of the game on google play store.
